mapper.select: SELECT subject_code AS subjectCode , member_id AS memberId , subject_number AS subjectNumber , subject_name AS subjectName , subject_date AS subjectDate FROM subject

SELECT contract_unit_code AS contractUnitCode , member_id AS memberId , contract_unit_month AS contractUnitMonth , contract_unit_oneyear AS contractUnitOneyear , contract_unit_twoyear AS contractUnitTwoyear , contract_unit_date AS contractUnitDate
FROM contract_unit

SELECT goods_database_code AS goodsDbCode, member_id AS memberId, goods_database_name AS goodsDbName, goods_database_category AS goodsDbCategory, goods_database_number AS goodsDbNumber, goods_database_color AS goodsDbColor, goods_database_weight AS goodsDbWeight, goods_database_speed AS goodsDbSpeed, goods_database_size AS goodsDbSize, goods_database_nation AS goodsDbNation, goods_database_load AS goodsDbLoad, goods_database_distance AS goodsDbDistance, goods_database_battery AS goodsDbBattery, goods_database_time AS goodsDbTime, goods_database_made AS goodsDbMade, goods_database_description AS goodsDbDescription, goods_database_image AS goodsDbImage, goods_database_date AS goodsDbDate FROM goods_database

SELECT member_id AS memberId ,member_pw AS memberPw ,member_name AS memberName ,member_level AS memberLevel ,member_birth AS memberBirth ,member_address AS memberAddress ,member_email AS memberEmail ,member_phone AS memberPhone ,shop_code AS shopCode ,member_insert_date AS memberInsertDate ,member_update_date AS memberUpdateDate FROM member
